column5: Up to camp one last time before the summer ends and back to school / work routine starts again...  Managed to get through another year with Monique... lol 19 years now I don't know how I put up with her.  Also gto my Dad and Aunt Claire in for the night for the first time.  Took them out fishing for the afternoon and my Aunt cleaned up and showed us all how it was done.. what a fish fry we had!!!  This is the second big green caterpillar we see... must be a lunar moth or something    Avery and our first pickerel    Then I brought the real fishermen out!           My Dad had never done topwater before...  theres plenty off the dock,  he got a real kick outta catching a fish with no live bait.      Avery taking a few loonies form his great Aunt... little buggers getting pretty good at crib!                 A nice family fish fry.     Avery with a bass off the dock.       Aver built a lean too during the cold front that blew through.    After my dad left we spent the day exploring the water below the rapids. We did very well.             Monique even managed to get us our salad!!               Out Jimmy Jamming with the kids!       Redneck corkscrew.....     Back to work for a couple of days and then its up to temagami with the good ole boys for the long weekend!
Great family report TJ. Loads of great pics too!  Happy Anniversary you two!
looks like a wonderful family outing.  im sure it was great having your dad and aunt there for a couple of days.  family and fishing.  it really doesnt get any better than that.  jason
Great report and pics TJ  Looks like everyone had a fantastic time out there!   uummmm that fish fry sure looks good Thanks for sharing Leechman
What a wonderful family vacation. It feels good to have your whole family together enjoying themselves.  Those memories are priceless.
Great report TJ.  Congratulations to you and Monique on celebrated 19 year together.  John
Happy Anniversary TJ and Monique!  Nice Report as well.
Congratulations on 19 years!   Always enjoy the Jiggy Jiggy reports........great fun.   Oh and I love the wine opener
Happy Anniversary! Looks like another great time at the camp. My dad also got a kick out of watching me catch fish with no live bait.lol And I like the red neck cork screw  .
Good Deal.  Looks like Mom and Dad are taking the kids to fishing school.   Hope you all learned something.
nice catches!!  love seeing the family vacation reports...

Ahhhh! nice family g2g, and congratulations on your 19th anniverary. Us old'uns will out fish you young'uns any time Nice pics, but why did the last few come up as RED X's   did'nt get to see the Redneck corkscrew
congrats on the 19th!!!!!  what a great way to celebrate, great report!  cheers!

What kind of nut takes their aunt,dad and kids on their anniversary to a place called get jiggy jiggy with it?Congrats on the 19th Monique you could have done better but thanx for taking him off of the streets.He is one ugly ,hairy street walker.By the way,I wore that shirt that I got from TJ the other day and there was a fiver in the pocket! Thanx bud. Joe
Nice of you to pop in here for a spell  All of you are looking great as usual.  I wish you wouldn't show those fish fry's, my mouth is watering now.  Joey

Its postage for the peanuts... which were good... you know were...    I know, I know... its been a very busy summer..  the pickerel are very scared now...lol  the bass and pike are happeir... its like when a new kid shows up to class, and the attention is taken off of you...
Happy Belated Anniversary to both of you and Thanks for the report and all the pics.  Mike
Great report and pics Boss!!!  Looks like Granny put the Whoop-Ass on the fish for y'all!!!
looks like every one had a great time contrats
....Has it been another year already, she is a tolerant women.  Great camp pics yet again bud, next year can't come soon enough.
cant believe everything u can do when tooks not there lmao
i still luv u like a brother
Back of the line, Greg. Everybody loves him like a brudder. Some have even tried as a sister.
